EmailTemplate.subject: Complete the registry of, {!Entity_CP__c.Name}, as a supplier of Engenium Capital.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear, {!Entity_CP__c.Registration_Contact_First_Name__c}:
You're receiving this email, as part of the enrollment process of, {!Entity_CP__c.Name}, as of supplier of Engenium Capital.
For further reference, please note that this process was initiated by:
{!User.Name} {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
The process is easy and fast, and we'll guide you at every step. If you have doubts, don't hesitate in contacting us to the following WhatsApp number: 55-3717-9208 (from 8:00am to 5:30pm, Monday through Friday)
During the process we'll ask you information about:
The account receivable contact Fiscal details Payment details
At the final step, it will be necessary that you attach:
The cover page of the bank account statement where you will receive the payment Your RFC (if you are a national provider) / "Tax ID" (for foreigners)
The system only accepts JPG, JPGE, PNG formats. There are free sites where you can convert a PDF to JPG, you can use this *: https://smallpdf.com/es/convertidor-pdf
Take into account that in this digital platform you will fill out the application, but the process ends when you receive our confirmation email.
Let's continue building great businesses together!
Click here to start your registration process
Kind regards,
Supplier Success - Engenium Capital
